body.p: You can create multiple VSA clusters of same or different type by specifying the configuration in the cloud model. The term add and update in the document means editing the respective YAML files to add or update the configurations/values.

section.title: Cloud configuration changes to create more than one cluster (can i get a sample file of the following ??)
section.p:
You must edit the YAML files to create more than one cluster.
Add new nodes in baremetal_config.yml with unique name and node_id for each cluster.
Add new resource-nodes in control_plane.yml with name, resource-prefix, and server-role
Update server_roles.yml with new VSA nodes.
Add new nodes in servers.yml.

section.title: Cloud configuration changes to create two cluster one with adoptive optimization (AO) enabled and another without adoptive optimization

ol.li: Add new nodes in baremetal_config.yml with unique name and node_id for each cluster.
Add new resource-nodes in control_plane.yml with name, resource-prefix, and server-role.
Modify the disk_set for AO and without AO [use different files and diffirent disk_set
Update server_roles.yml with new VSA nodes and approriate disk_set used for that node.

Add new nodes in servers.yml.
If you have configured your cloud to have more than one cluster or n-clusters then remember to note down all the cluster IPs.
